meanings.definition: A reptile of the order Rhynchocephalia, including the tuatara.
meanings.sent1: The rhynchocephalian basked in the sun to warm up its body.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of the rhynchocephalian to learn more about its habitat.
meanings.sent3: The zookeeper joked that the rhynchocephalian was the king of the reptile exhibit.
meanings.sent4: In the ancient times, the rhynchocephalian was considered a mystical creature.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the unique appearance of the rhynchocephalian at the zoo.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the order Rhynchocephalia.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a rhynchocephalian fossil for visitors to see.
meanings.sent2: The researcher described the scales on the rhynchocephalian as unique.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a rhynchocephalian-inspired mural on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had a pattern that resembled the rhynchocephalian's skin.
meanings.sent5: The exhibit showcased various rhynchocephalian artifacts from ancient times.
